name: Curry
details: Curry is a dish that typically consists of meat, vegetables, and spices in a sauce. It is often served with rice and is a popular dish in Thai cuisine.

name: Noodles
details: Noodles are a staple in Thai cuisine and come in many varieties. They can be served in soups, stir-fries, or as a main dish with meat and vegetables.

name: Soup
details: Thai soups are often made with a combination of meat or seafood, vegetables, and herbs. They can be spicy or mild and are usually served as a starter or as a main dish.

name: Stir Fry
details: Stir fry dishes are a popular and quick way to prepare a meal in Thai cuisine. They usually consist of meat, vegetables, and spices cooked quickly over high heat.

name: Salad
details: Thai salads are often made with fresh herbs, vegetables, and fruits, and are dressed with a spicy or sour dressing. They can be served as a starter or as a main dish.

name: Seafood
details: Thailand is known for its fresh seafood, and it is a popular ingredient in many Thai dishes. Seafood can be grilled, fried, or steamed, and is often served with a spicy dipping sauce.
